summary: TOYOTA 4RUNNER AIR BAG RECALL NOTICE.   CONSUMER STATES THAT HE NEVER RECEIVED THE RECALL FOR THE SUSPENSION ON HIS VEHICLE.   *NJ  THE CONSUMER WAS INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT. HE LOST CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE AND SUBSEQUENTLY HIT SEVERAL TRESS HEAD ON. THE AIRBAGS DID NOT DEPLOY. THE VEHICLE WAS TOTALED. RECALL # 02V021000. *JB
